text.text:
You can @UUEMYPLP8 start scheduling a meeting by using the `/ts-start` command. I'll then send you a message :envelope: that asks you for your attendees and your preferences. 

 When prompted, you can use the `/ts-select` command to choose which meetings you can't attend from a list generated from your university :mortar_board: timetable. 

 Also, as an owner of a meeting, you can confirm, reschedule or cancel a meeting :family: using the `/ts-confirm` command. 

 Finally, at any time you can use the `/ts-config` command to change the iCal :calendar: address you originally provided.

elements.text: ‚ùì You can get help at any time with the `/ts` or `/ts-help` command.
